mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a black and white photocopy of a photograph. The subjects are a group of men: three men standing behind four men seated on chairs. The men have been identified in the margins with handwritten notes: "Dr. A. W. Pleasants, Will Price, John Thompson, Hugh Williams, Nolan Brooks, Johnson Pettigrew, Judge Fisher."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Seven Men: Pleasants, Price, Thompson, Williams, Brooks, Pettigrew, Fisher
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans -- Portraits
